Rulings.Edison:
●The optional Trigger Effect can miss its activation timing.
●You can activate this effect if the last thing to happen was your opponent Special Summoning of a monster from their hand.
●This effect can't be activated during the Damage Step.
●If you have 2 Cyber Dinosaurs in your hand when your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand, you can only activate the effect of 1 of the Cyber Dinosaurs.
●If your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand while Stumbling is active, you can chain Cyber Dinosaur's effect (Chain Link 2) to the effect of Stumbling (Chain Link 1).
●If Gorz the Emissary of Darkness is Special Summoned from your opponent's hand with its effect when you inflict damage to their life points with a card effect, you can chain Cyber Dinosaur's effect to Gorz the Emissary of Darkness' damage inflicting effect.
Rulings.Tengu:
(1) When your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand, you can Special Summon this card from your hand.
●The (1) optional Trigger Effect can miss its activation timing.
●You can activate this effect if the last thing to happen was your opponent Special Summoning of a monster from their hand.
●This effect cannot be activated during the Damage Step.
●If you have 2 Cyber Dinosaurs in your hand when your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand, you can only activate the effect of 1 of the Cyber Dinosaurs.
●If your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand while Stumbling is active, you can chain Cyber Dinosaur's effect (Chain Link 2) to the effect of Stumbling (Chain Link 1).
●If Gorz the Emissary of Darkness is Special Summoned from your opponent's hand with its effect when you inflict damage to their life points with a card effect, you can chain Cyber Dinosaur's effect to Gorz the Emissary of Darkness' damage inflicting effect.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect is a Quick Effect.
● If your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand while 'Stumbling' is applying, you can chain 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect to the effect of 'Stumbling'. 'Stumbling's' effect will be Chain Link 1 and 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect will be Chain Link 2.
● If your opponent Special Summons a Machine from their hand while 'Cyber Summon Blaster' is applying, you can chain 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect to the effect of 'Cyber Summon Blaster'. 'Cyber Summon Blaster's' effect will be Chain Link 1 and 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect will be Chain Link 2.
● If you have 2 'Cyber Dinosaurs' in your hand when your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand, you can only activate the effect of 1 of the 'Cyber Dinosaurs'.
● If 'Gorz the Emissary of Darkness' is Special Summoned from your opponent's hand with its effect when you inflict damage to their life points with a card effect, you can chain 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect to 'Gorz the Emissary of Darkness'' damage inflicting effect.
Rulings.TeleDAD:
● 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect is a Quick Effect.
● If your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand while 'Stumbling' is applying, you can chain 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect to the effect of 'Stumbling'. 'Stumbling's' effect will be Chain Link 1 and 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect will be Chain Link 2.
● If your opponent Special Summons a Machine from their hand while 'Cyber Summon Blaster' is applying, you can chain 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect to the effect of 'Cyber Summon Blaster'. 'Cyber Summon Blaster's' effect will be Chain Link 1 and 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect will be Chain Link 2.
● If you have 2 'Cyber Dinosaurs' in your hand when your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand, you can only activate the effect of 1 of the 'Cyber Dinosaurs'.
● If 'Gorz the Emissary of Darkness' is Special Summoned from your opponent's hand with its effect when you inflict damage to their life points with a card effect, you can chain 'Cyber Dinosaur's' effect to 'Gorz the Emissary of Darkness'' damage inflicting effect.
